description: Try our easy to follow Roast Pork with Apple & Apricot Stuffing recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Roast Pork with Apple & Apricot Stuffing
name: Roast Pork with Apple & Apricot Stuffing Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk in 1 1/2 cups chicken stock, 75g quince paste and 1 tbs mustard. Simmer until smooth. Strain into a jug.
